_header: When that Jesu was born young
Note: For the versions in the Northern Homily Cycle see 5511 and 6387.
Subjects: sermon texts, Gospel; Epiphany, feast of

Bod425.First Lines:
When þat ihesus was born yhingIn daies of erode þe
                    kyng…
Bod425.Last Lines:
…Hamward bi a noþer waiIn to þaire rike went are
                    þai
Bod425.Editions:
Heuser,  Wilhelm. 
             “Eine vergessene handscrift des Surteespsalters und die dort
                eingeschalteten mittelenglischen gedichte.” 
             Anglia
         29 (1906): 385-412: 402-4.
